title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Neighborhood Watch Event
content:
The Neighborhood Watch Event enters its second week with an opportunity to unlock another LSPD uniform. Engage in off-the-books Dispatch Work for Vincent with any eligible Law Enforcement Vehicle, and earn 2X GTA$ and RP (4X for GTA+ Members) all week long.

Complete three Dispatch Work assignments to satisfy the Neighborhood Watch Event Weekly Challenge and get the Winter LSPD Officer w/ Tie Outfit in addition to a GTA$100,000 prize.
